Description: Chest pain type (typical angina, atypical angina, non-anginal, asymptomatic angina)
Fasting blood sugar (0 if < 120 mg/dl, 1 if > 120 mg/dl)
Maximum heart rate achieved during thalium stress test
ST depression induced by exercise relative to rest
Slope of peak exercise (upsloping, flat, downsloping)
Number of major vessels colored by fluoroscopy (0-3)
Thalium stress test result (normal, fixed defect, reversible defect)
